title: Reusable Mesh Bag daily life
subTitle: The Ways to Reduce the Waste of Plastic Bags

marketingArguments.title: Against the plastic
marketingArguments.speech: Decline the bag given by the store employees. The most challenging aspect of this is remembering to take them into the store, and creating the habit. Each time you go to the store with this bag itâ€™s one more plastic bags that you saved!

marketingArguments.title: Multi-Purpose
marketingArguments.speech: This Net bag are widely used in your day-to-day life. They are not only used for grocery shopping, but also for storing fruits, vegetables, nuts, snacks, toys, shoes, clothes, cosmetics, sports equipment, office supplies, camping tools, travel accessories and more.

marketingArguments.title: Easy-Wash
marketingArguments.speech: Product which is designed primarily to be resistant. It has been created with a strong organic cotton and double-layer sewing, which can be washed by hand or washing machine. Very easy to clean and easy to dry.

marketingArguments.title: Best gift idea
marketingArguments.speech: Can be a perfect gift choice for your friends and family who want to begin with the zero waste lifestyle!

specifications.label: Material
specifications.value: Made of 100% cotton biodegradable, recyclable, reusable and long life.
